com.appsimobile.appsisupport.home

Class AppsiHomeServiceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.appsimobile.appsisupport.home.AppsiHomeServiceProvider

  • public abstract class AppsiHomeServiceProvider
extends Service
    A service class a plugin must extend. The plugin should register all it's fields when the method onRegisterFields is called. The method registerField must be called to register each provided field. Created by nick on 8/9/13.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppsiHomeServiceProvider()

    • Method Detail

      • updateBundleForField

        protected abstract void updateBundleForField(Bundle bundle,
                        int fieldId)
        Callback used to update the values of a field
        Parameters:
        bundle - The bundle to put the values in. @see com.appsimobile.appsisupport.home.HomeServiceContract$DataResponse
        fieldId - The id if the field as given to AppsiHomeServiceProvider#registerField

      • onRegisterFields

        protected abstract void onRegisterFields()
        Called when Appsi needs information about the provided fields. Plugins should call #registerField(int, int, String, int) for each field the service provides. In case fields are only compatible under certain circumstances make sure you only include compatible fields.

      • registerField

        public void registerField(int fieldId,
                 int fieldType,
                 java.lang.String displayName,
                 int previewImageResourceId)
        Register a field. Call only when onRegisterFields is called
        Parameters:
        fieldId - id if the field, used to aquire data
        fieldType - the type of the field
        displayName - how to present this to the user
        previewImageResourceId - the image 48dp x 48dp placed next to the name

      • registerField

        public void registerField(int fieldId,
                 int fieldType,
                 int displayNameResourceId,
                 int previewImageResourceId)
        Register a field. Call only when onRegisterFields is called
        Parameters:
        fieldId - id if the field, used to aquire data
        fieldType - the type of the field
        displayNameResourceId - the resource id of the string to use. e.g. R.string.mystring
        previewImageResourceId - the image 48dp x 48dp placed next to the name
